name: ARRaycastResult
desc: Information about a real-world surface found by examining a point on the screen.

items.name: var worldTransform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: The position, rotation, and scale, of the ray's intersection with the target.

items.name: var anchor: ARAnchor?
items.desc: The anchor for the plane that the ray intersected.

items.name: var target: ARRaycastQuery.Target
items.desc: The type of surface that the ray intersects.

items.name: enum ARRaycastQuery.Target
items.desc: The types of surface you allow a raycast to intersect with.

items.name: var targetAlignment: ARRaycastQuery.TargetAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the plane that the ray intersected.

items.name: enum ARRaycastQuery.TargetAlignment
items.desc: A specification that indicates a target's alignment with respect to gravity.
